alert.note: Alert for Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 9:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN MERCER COUNTY THROUGH 1000 PM EDT... At 924 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Rockford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Celina, Rockford, Mendon, Chattanooga, Neptune and Tama. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
